Show:

API Class

Defined in: src/api.js:4

The API registry for freedom.js. Used to look up requested APIs, and provides a bridge for core APIs to act like normal APIs.

Constructor

API

(
  • debug
)

Defined in src/api.js:4

Parameters:

  • debug Debug

    The debugger to use for logging.

getCore

(
  • name
  • from
)
Promise

Defined in src/api.js:70

Get a core API connected to a given FreeDOM module.

Parameters:

  • name String

    the API to retrieve.

  • from port.App

    The instantiating App.

Returns:

Promise:

A promise of a fdom.App look-alike matching a local API definition.

getInterfaceStyle

(
  • name
)
String

Defined in src/api.js:100

Get the style in which a core API is written. This method is guaranteed to know the style of a provider returned from a previous getCore call, and so does not use promises.

Parameters:

  • name String

    The name of the provider.

Returns:

String:

The coding style, as used by fdom.port.Provider.prototype.getInterface.

register

(
  • name
  • constructor
  • style
)

Defined in src/api.js:44

Register a core API provider.

Parameters:

  • name String

    the API name.

  • constructor Function

    the function to create a provider for the API.

  • style String?

    The style the provider is written in. Valid styles are documented in fdom.port.Provider.prototype.getInterface. Defaults to provideAsynchronous

(
  • name
  • definition
)

Defined in src/api.js:34

Set an API to a definition.

Parameters:

  • name String

    The API name.

  • definition API

    The JSON object defining the API.
